Package client

Class ClientMissionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientMissionHandler
  • public class ClientMissionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The ClientMissionHandler class acts as a controller for the client-side of the application. It handles the communication between the client and the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      • CONNECT_TO_SERVER

        public static void CONNECT_TO_SERVER​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                                     java.lang.String ip,
                                     java.lang.String port)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Connects to the server with the provided IP address and port. Sends the connection details to the server. If the connection is successful, hides the current window and opens the login window.
        Parameters:
        event - The mouse event that triggered the connection attempt.
        ip - The IP address of the server.
        port - The port number of the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an exception occurs during the connection process.

      • GET_QUESTIONS

        public static void GET_QUESTIONS​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<common.Question> listView,
                                 javafx.scene.control.TableView<common.Question> table,
                                 javafx.scene.control.Label statusLabel)
        Retrieves the list of questions from the server and populates the provided ListView and TableView.
        Parameters:
        listView - The ObservableList used by the ListView to display questions.
        table - The TableView used to display questions.
        statusLabel - The label used to display the upload status.

      • DISCONNECT_FROM_SERVER

        public static void DISCONNECT_FROM_SERVER()
        Disconnects from the server. Sends a disconnection request to the server with the client's connection details.

      • LOGIN

        public static boolean LOGIN​(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            LoginController loginController)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to log in a user with the provided username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to log in.
        password - The password of the user to log in.
        loginController - The LoginController instance associated with the login process.
        Returns:
        true if the login is successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an error occurs during the login process.

      • ADD_QUESTIONS

        public static java.lang.Object ADD_QUESTIONS​(java.lang.String id,
                                             java.lang.String questionNumber,
                                             java.lang.String lecturer,
                                             java.lang.String courseName,
                                             java.lang.String subjectName,
                                             java.lang.String questionText,
                                             java.lang.String answer1,
                                             java.lang.String answer2,
                                             java.lang.String answer3,
                                             java.lang.String answer4,
                                             java.lang.String rightAnswer)
        Adds a question to the database with the provided question details.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the question.
        questionNumber - The question number.
        lecturer - The name of the lecturer.
        courseName - The name of the course.
        subjectName - The name of the subject.
        questionText - The text of the question.
        answer1 - The first answer option.
        answer2 - The second answer option.
        answer3 - The third answer option.
        answer4 - The fourth answer option.
        rightAnswer - The correct answer.
        Returns:
        The result of the question addition operation.

        public static void ADD_PERFORMED_TEST​(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String subject,
                                      java.lang.String course,

                                      java.lang.String author,

        subject - The subject of the performed test.
        course - The course of the performed test.
        userId - The ID of the user who performed the test.
        author - The author of the test.
        grade - The grade received for the performed test.
        copycheck - The copycheck status of the performed test.
        type - The type of the test.

      • GET_QUESTION_TABLE

        public static void GET_QUESTION_TABLE​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<common.Question> listView,
                                      javafx.scene.control.TableView<common.Question> table,
                                      java.lang.String lecturer)
        Retrieves the question table data for a specific lecturer and displays it in the provided list view and table. This method sends a request to the server to fetch the question table data for the specified lecturer. It populates the provided list view and table with the retrieved data if the request is successful.
        Parameters:
        listView - The list view to populate with the question data.
        table - The table to populate with the question data.
        lecturer - The name of the lecturer for whom to retrieve the question table data.

      • UPLOAD_TEST

        public static void UPLOAD_TEST​(java.io.File selectedFile)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Uploads a test file to the server. This method allows the client to behave like a server by uploading a test file to the server. It establishes a socket connection with the server and sends the file's contents over the network.
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - The test file to be uploaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while uploading the file.

      • UPDATE_PERFORMED_TESTS

        public static void UPDATE_PERFORMED_TESTS​(common.User user,
                                          java.util.List<common.PerformedTest> ptToUpdate)
        Updates the performed tests for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        user - The User object representing the user.
        ptToUpdate - The List of PerformedTest objects to update.

      • SELECTED_QUESTIONS

        public static void SELECTED_QUESTIONS​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<common.Question> question,
                                      javafx.scene.control.TableView<common.Question> questionTable,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> approvedList)
        Retrieves selected questions based on the approved list and populates the provided TableView.
        Parameters:
        question - The ObservableList to populate with Question objects.
        questionTable - The TableView to set with the populated list.
        approvedList - The List of approved questions.

      • ADD_POINTS

        tableView2 - The TableView of test_question objects.

        idTest - The ID of the test.

      • ADD_Test

        public static void ADD_Test​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<common.Test> test_question,
                            javafx.scene.control.TableView<common.Question> tableView,
                            javafx.scene.control.TableView<common.test_question> tableView2,
                            java.lang.String idTest,
                            java.lang.String subjectName,
                            java.lang.String courseName,
                            java.lang.String lecturer,
                            java.lang.Integer durationTest,
                            java.lang.String idTestCode,
                            java.lang.String textLecturer,
                            java.lang.String textStudent,
                            java.lang.String maxNumTest)
        Adds a new Test.
        Parameters:
        test_question - The ObservableList of Test objects.
        tableView - The TableView of Question objects.
        tableView2 - The TableView of test_question objects.
        idTest - The ID of the test.
        subjectName - The name of the subject.
        courseName - The name of the course.
        lecturer - The name of the lecturer.
        durationTest - The duration of the test.
        idTestCode - The code of the test.
        textLecturer - The lecturer's text.
        textStudent - The student's text.
        maxNumTest - The maximum number of tests.

      • MAX_NUM_TEST

        The maximum number of tests, or null if not found.
